Module PandemicSimulation
Package com.devandrepascoa.data_structure

Class Person

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.devandrepascoa.data_structure.Point
      • com.devandrepascoa.data_structure.Person
  • public class Person
extends Point
    The com.data_structure.Person class provides the pillar for the whole program, it will be the data structure for plotting the pandemic graph due to it's infectedPeople attribute

        Parameters:
        p2 - Person instance
        Returns:
        true if p2 is within radius of infection
